keywords.description: Curious about technology and its possibilities.
keywords.404: The page you were looking for was not found.
keywords.aboutMe: Since my childhood, I have been passionate about technology, so I decided to combine the useful with the pleasant, and today I am a fullstack developer. I don't have formal experience, like CLT, but I am a freelancer with some projects I am working on. I am eager to learn day by day and improve every aspect that a true fullstack developer can offer.

projects.name: Minecraft Tools
projects.description: Useful tools for a better Minecraft experience.

projects.name: Soft Skills Check
projects.description: Developed by a volunteer team of students from Faculdade Senac DF, I was the development leader of this project. This webapp provides self-assessments of soft skills.

projects.name: Medellin Original Company
projects.description: Clothing and accessories e-commerce. I participated in the entire development, from scratch to production, except for the UI.

projects.description: Website to showcase the fictitious PDTI/PSI 2025-26 of Banco do Brasil.
